Title: Appointments Management - GP
Summary: Supports the administration, scheduling, resourcing and reporting of appointments.

Title: Patient Information Maintenance
Summary: Supports the registration of Patients and the maintenance of all Patient personal information. Supports the organisation and presentation of a comprehensive Patient Record. Also supports the management of related persons and configuring access to Citizen Services.

Title: Prescribing
Summary: Supports the effective and safe prescribing of medical products and appliances to Patients. Information to support prescribing will be available.

Title: Recording Consultations
Summary: Supports the standardised recording of Consultations and other General Practice activities. Also supports the extraction of Female Genital Mutilation (FGM) data for the FGM data set.

Title: Appointments Management - Citizen
Summary: Enables Citizens to manage their Appointments online. Supports the use of Appointment slots that have been configured in Appointments Management - GP.

Title: Care Homes
Summary: Enables a record of the Resident's health and care needs to be maintained and shared with parties who are involved in providing care, to support decision making and the effective planning and delivery of care.

Title: Caseload Management
Summary: Supports the allocation of appropriate Health and Care Professionals to Patients/Service Users in need of support, ensuring balanced workloads and the efficient use of staff and other resources.

Title: Clinical Decision Support
Summary: Supports clinical decision-making to improve Patient safety at the point of care.

Title: Referral Management
Summary: Supports recording, reviewing, sending, and reporting of Patient Referrals. Enables Referral information to be included in the Patient Record.

Title: Resource Management
Summary: Supports the management and reporting of Practice information, resources, Staff Members and related organisations. Also enables management of Staff Member availability and inactivity.

Title: Communication Management
Summary: Supports the delivery and management of communications to Citizens and Practice staff.

Title: Document Management
Summary: Supports the secure management and classification of all forms unstructured electronic documents including those created by scanning paper documents. Also enables processing of documents and matching documents with Patients
